title: Proposed Bill to amend the Trust Ordinance, No.9 of 1917
decision_details: - The Proposal made by Hon. (Dr) Wijayadasa Rajapaksha, the Minister of Justice, to amend  the Trust Ordinance, so as to widen its scope to meet the international standards in order to minimize the risk of money laundering and raising money for Terrorism, was approved by the Cabinet.
